<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> ofp

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>

</value></part><part><name>arg</name>=<value> local

</value></part><part><name>eff</name>=<value> local

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> GUI Control

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Set the text of a control of the currently active user dialog or display. This command can be used for: static texts, buttons, edit lines and active texts as well as for images, where you can use it to set the image path.

Read [[Arma: GUI Configuration]] for more information about user dialogs and controls.
<template lineStart="1"><title>Feature </title><part><name index="1"/><value> Warning </value></part><part><name index="2"/><value> <tt>[[ctrlSetText]] [idc, text]</tt> syntax does not support [[CT_SHORTCUTBUTTON]], but the alternative syntax <tt>control [[ctrlSetText]] text</tt> does.</value></part></template>

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> [[ctrlSetText]] [idc, text]

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> [idc, text]: [[Array]]

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> idc: [[Number]] - control ID

</value></part><part><name>p3</name>=<value> text: [[String]] - text or image path, depending on the control type

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]]

</value></part><part><name>s2</name>=<value> control [[ctrlSetText]] text

</value></part><part><name>p21</name>=<value>  control: [[Control]]

</value></part><part><name>p22</name>=<value> text: [[String]]

</value></part><part><name>r2</name>=<value> [[Nothing]]
		  
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>[[ctrlSetText]] [100, "Hello world"]; <template><title>cc</title><part><name index="1"/><value>for Dialogs</value></part></template></code>

</value></part><part><name>x2</name>=<value> <code>_control [[ctrlSetText]] "Hello world."; <template><title>cc</title><part><name index="1"/><value>for Displays</value></part></template></code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[ctrlText]] [[ctrlTextSelection]] [[ctrlSetTextSelection]]
</value></part></template>
